source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a wide shot of a modern city street in Japan on a bright, sunny day. The scene features clean sidewalks, contemporary buildings, and a multi-lane road lined with trees. There is light traffic on the road and a few pedestrians on the sidewalk.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a wide shot of a modern city street in Japan on a bright, sunny day. The scene features clean sidewalks, contemporary buildings, and a multi-lane road lined with trees. There is light traffic on the road and a few pedestrians on the sidewalk.

generated_critique: The caption should mention that several cyclists are riding quickly through the intersection, as this is an important aspect of the street activity that helps convey the dynamic motion present in the scene.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This is a wide shot of a modern city street in Japan on a bright, sunny day. The scene features clean sidewalks, contemporary buildings, and a multi-lane road lined with trees. Several cyclists are riding quickly through the intersection, adding dynamic motion to the scene, while there is light traffic on the road and a few pedestrians on the sidewalk.
